sql: SELECT DISTINCT INSTRUCTORalias0.NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR AS INSTRUCTORalias0 INNER JOIN OFFERING_INSTRUCTOR AS OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID = INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID INNER JOIN COURSE_OFFERING AS COURSE_OFFERINGalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.OFFERING_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.OFFERING_ID INNER JOIN AREA AS AREAalias0 ON COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.COURSE_ID = AREAalias0.COURSE_ID WHERE AREAalias0.AREA LIKE "%hardware%" ;
